title: Could this get some attention?
body:

Either change the in-game color or the store image. I got tricked when I bought it and I'm pretty disappointed, thanks.


EDIT 28/11 : The skin has been updated on the PBE and now correctly features dark hair.

replies.body: The dark hair looks better, definitely.
Could it have to do with which map you're on?

No, that's too much of a difference to be merely the background.

His hair went from jet black to milk chocolate.
are you really crying over that. LMFAO

1. Not OP
2. They are not crying about anything, just explaining the difference.
3. If you are shown a specific coloring, and the coloring is different after you spent money, that is false advertising, which is illegal in most countries.

"Wow are you actually upset that they didn't deliver what was advertised?!? HAHAHA I bet OP is the kind of guy who complains when he buys milk at the store and the container is just full of fruit punch!"

-i am your cure

"his hair isn't good enough for me" 

get a grip. lmfao.
Boy it doesn't matter what it is, if you're advertising something and not selling it, that's false advertising. That's how you lose trust and customers smh kid never worked in a business before.

As someone who's taking a painting class this semester, it's conceivable for those colors to look like that given the lighting. Mix brown (burnt umber) and blue-gray (paynes gray) to get black. I do agree the lighting is not the cause, though, or the rest of the colors would look more different, too.

Hey! Sorry about this inconsistency, not really sure how that happened...but we agree with the rest of you, the black haired one definitely looks better :) We'll update it as soon as we can!

If you do still want to refund it though, you will unfortunately need to go through Player Support to handle it :/

Sorry about the confusion!
Ask the support team, you might of gotten the wrong chroma
How would that be the wrong chroma? I think it's clear enough that it's the same and that the hair displayed isn't the correct one.

How dissapointed are you? 

Are you on a personal level upset or upset as a management perspective. Like oh hey we need to not do that guys vs geez i really got ripped off and i feel really bad about it.
Maybe Riot KateyKhaos can look into this
It might be a bug/ error with the code. I would just make a ticket about it because they will have to fix it anyways.
You can easily make the change your self through a program Wooxy and Photoshop.. I can do it for you if you want.

Or (now I know that this is a revolutionary idea, so bear with me) DON'T FUCKING SUPPORT RIOT BY BUYING THESE SHIT EXCUSES FOR CONTENT. Riot literally went through and purged all the skins that they deemed "recolors" only to fucking launch chromas for the same price. Stop. Letting. Riot. Get. Away. With. This. Shit.

You know, if some one gave me a car and told me ''here you can drive this for free''.
Then said: "Oh btw, you can get it sprayed in different colors for some money, but driving it still is free''

I'd be pretty elated cause i'm driving a free car.

Point is: Nobody is forcing you to buy anything.
Game is free, you can support the game and the money you give in support actually gives you some extras.

I'll be the first to admit that Riot sometimes handles their sales stuff...disingenuous or just outright dumb...but it's still a free game.

While you're being utterly petty, OP actually has a valid point.
He didn't get what was actually promised to him. (Ingame / store discrepancy)

Not the point. The point is they Riot is entirely hypocritical here. They purged all the recolor skins from the store, then promptly launched an entire line of skins that are literally called "recolors" but they use this fancy word "chroma".

In addition to what Relic of Ages said, these chromas even have different outfits and designs. My favorite example being Lulu:
https://i.gyazo.com/abc40514697d8d1e46ba73544ea5cfb1.png
Ok, yes, some have little changes like this. But the vast majority are recolors that take literally 0 effort for Riot to make, and yet they charge real money for them.
